data.title: Today is the 61st anniversary of John Steinbeck winning the Nobel Prize in Literature on December 10, 1962. “Such is the prestige of the...
data.meta_description:
306 likes, 3 comments - steinbeckcenter on December 10, 2023: "Today is the 61st anniversary of John Steinbeck winning the Nobel Prize in Literature on December 10, 1962.

“Such is the prestige of the Nobel award and of this place where I stand that I am impelled, not to squeak like a grateful and apologetic mouse, but to roar like a lion out of pride in my profession and in the great and good men who have practiced it through the ages.” 

His full speech at the Nobel Banquet in the Stockholm City Hall can be seen at our museum, by using the link in our bio or here: https://www.nobelprize.org/prizes/literature/1962/steinbeck/speech/ 

#NobelPrize #Literature #JohnSteinbeck #NationalSteinbeckCenter #NonProfit".
